poemsDataJson.list_full: かささぎの 渡(わた)せる橋(はし)に 置(お)く霜(しも)の 白(しろ)きを見(み)れば 夜(よ)ぞ更(ふ)けにける
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If I see that bridge//That is spanned by flights of magpies//Across the arc of heaven//Made white with a deep-laid frost,//Then the night is almost past.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kasasagi no|Wataseru hashi ni|Oku shimo no|Shiroki o mireba|Yo zo fuke ni keru
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: しろきをみれは よそふけにける
poemsDataJson.author: 中納言家持(ちゅうなごんやかもち)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 宮中の冬の霜の夜更けの幻想的な美しさ
